message.content:
We first extract the key figures from each statement:

1. Free Cash Flow (FCF)  
 • Operating cash flow (from the cash flow statement): 803,237.11  
 • Capital expenditure (taken here as the “Purchase of Fixed Assets” from investing activities): 437,464.43  
  FCF = Operating CF – Capital Expenditures  
  FCF = 803,237.11 – 437,464.43 = 365,772.68

2. Return on Assets (ROA)  
 • Net Profit (from the income statement): 1,105,265.77  
 • Total Assets – we use the average of beginning and ending total assets.  
  Beginning Total Assets = 13,000,000.00  
  Ending Total Assets = 15,653,266.97  
  Average Total Assets = (13,000,000.00 + 15,653,266.97) / 2 = 14,326,633.49  
  ROA = (Net Profit / Average Total Assets) × 100  
  ROA = (1,105,265.77 / 14,326,633.49) × 100 ≈ 7.72%

3. Return on Equity (ROE)  
 • Net Profit: 1,105,265.77  
 • Owner’s Equity – use beginning and ending values (here Retained Earnings change the total equity)  
  Beginning Owner’s Equity = 13,000,000.00  
  Ending Owner’s Equity = 14,105,265.77  
  Average Owner’s Equity = (13,000,000.00 + 14,105,265.77) / 2 = 13,552,632.89  
  ROE = (Net Profit / Average Owner’s Equity) × 100  
  ROE = (1,105,265.77 / 13,552,632.89) × 100 ≈ 8.16%

4. Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio  
 • Operating Cash Flow: 803,237.11  
 • Net Profit: 1,105,265.77  
  Ratio = Operating CF / Net Profit  
  = 803,237.11 / 1,105,265.77 ≈ 0.73

5. Net Profit Margin  
 • Net Profit: 1,105,265.77  
 • Total Revenue (from the income statement): 5,760,023.09  
  Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100  
  = (1,105,265.77 / 5,760,023.09) × 100 ≈ 19.20%

6. Gross Profit Margin  
 • Gross Profit (from income statement): 2,620,023.09  
 • Total Revenue: 5,760,023.09  
  Gross Profit Margin = (Gross Profit / Total Revenue) × 100  
  = (2,620,023.09 / 5,760,023.09) × 100 ≈ 45.49%

Now we provide the results in the required JSON format.

{
  "solution": {
    "Free Cash Flow (FCF)": "365772.68",
    "Return on Assets (ROA)": "7.72%",
    "Return on Equity (ROE)": "8.16%",
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "0.73",
    "Net Profit Margin": "19.20%",
    "Gross Profit Margin": "45.49%"
  }
}
